attributes.action: contract out more hospital cleaning to improve services and reduce infection rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent evidence from both the DeAnne Julius Review of Public Services and the 2008 Patient Environment Action Team scores shows that contracted out hospital cleaning performs better than in-house cleaning. The Prime Minister should act to secure those benefits for all by ensuring that all hospital cleaning contracts are re-tendered on a fair basis as soon as possible.
